responseText: If you must know; During the exodus, this whole region was a widespread network of encampments. The route that the people in the sandsquall desert followed toward Aela and the portal passed right through here. I am excavating those camps, to find the real history of this place. Care to help?
name: SQ_NOC_RVR_Samias_Miraleth_MartinSwift_23_Response
